title: Ticket #4086: job_hgq_autoregroup_basic_van can't be run repeatedly
description: job_hgq_autoregroup_basic_van can't be run repeatedly. It always writes to the same job log file, then reads that log file to determine when the job completes. As a result, after the first successful run, the jobs are considered to have exited immediately, causing other problems.
check_ins: 2013-Nov-19 13:32   Check-in [38756]: job_hgq_autoregroup_basic_van can now be run repeatedly. #4086 (By Alan De Smet )
